def_en: Rain is water that falls from the clouds in small drops.
In countries where rain only falls in certain seasons, this rain is referred to as the rains .
When rain falls, you can say that it is raining .

def_cn: （使）如雨点般落下；（使）大量降下
def_en: If someone rains blows, kicks, or bombs on a person or place, the person or place is attacked by many blows, kicks, or bombs. You can also say that blows, kicks, or bombs rain on a person or place.

def_cn: （从空中落下的）一阵，一连串
def_en: A rain of things is a large number of things that fall from the sky at the same time.
You can use the expression it never rains but it pours to mean that several unfortunate events often happen at the same time.
If you say that someone is as right as rain, you mean that they are completely well or healthy again, for example when they have recovered from an illness or a shock.

def_cn: 不管晴天或下雨;风雨无阻
def_en: If you say that someone does something rain or shine, you mean that they do it regularly, without being affected by the weather or other circumstances.
